# 빈도&심도

## 대인 손해액 빈도&심도


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
#빈도
nrow(filter(data,in1_los!=0))/nrow(data)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 0.0218325
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
#심도
sum(data$in1_los)/nrow(filter(data,in1_los!=0))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 4575576
```
:::
:::
